fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose two players each night. They get  converted to a random Rasen role with post 4000 or higher. Different ones. E
- *Game On!* — Game On — During the day, challenge another player. The next time they and the host are both present, the host will ping them in their private channel. Once they send a message, the host will, if or when they're both still online, the host will tell them they have 120 seconds to complete the following challenge:
> - Name ten GIM roles.
